remarks: Axiom of Equality.  One of the equality and substitution axioms for a non-logical predicate in our predicate calculus with equality.  It substitutes equal variables into the right-hand side of the ` e. ` binary predicate.  Axiom scheme C13' in [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of the preprint). It is a special case of Axiom B8 (p. 75) of system S2 of [Tarski] p. 77. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
